name: Walter's Rebound - Online Deathmatch Arena
description:
Walter's Rebound is a total recreation of Valve's title Ricochet but with improved mechanics & game-play with additions like bots, new maps, improved graphics, features like an in-game jukebox, game-play modifiers and more.

And of course it's multiplayer so you can play online with your friends or strangers.

Features:

  • Local play with Bots
  • Networked play with Players/Bots
  • Multiple Maps
  • Gameplay modifiers to spice things up
  • Customizable Player & Options
  • Revamped textures & models
  • Jukebox system with included tunes
  • Voice commands, talk like Walter!
  • Host local or dedicated servers
  • Classic gameplay refined and improved
Check out our Discord server for announcements, to find people to play with, or just chat! - https://discord.gg/bCBKYTA
